Key Match Events: Philadelphia 76ers lost to the Memphis Grizzlies 124-107
Pre-Game Insights: Joel Embiid had a heated argument with a Philadelphia Inquirer columnist, Marcus Hayes, before the game due to a recent column that Embiid considered personally disparaging
Post-Match Reflections: The incident will be investigated by the NBA
Joel Embiid's playing status this season has been a consistent source of conversation and frustration for the team and the seven-time All-Star
Miscellaneous Highlights: Joel Embiid has not played in a game this season due to injury and has missed several games throughout his career
The 76ers have worked on a potential plan for Embiid to play in the regular season but play fewer games to try to keep him healthy for the postseason
Others: The NBA fined the 76ers $100,000 for misrepresenting statements regarding Embiid's absence
The Sixers plan to keep Embiid out of back-to-back games this season
